title: Prawns baked in sea salt with thyme
steps: Put a layer of rock salt about 1cm/½in thick on a small roasting tray, lay half of the thyme on to it then place the prawns on the herbs. Put the remaining thyme over the top of the prawns then completely bury in the remaining salt.
Sprinkle lightly with water then bake in a preheated oven for 6-7 minutes, crack the salt, remove the prawns and serve with lemon wedges.
